item.title: Mergingkubeconfig
item.description: Merging kubeconfig files When you have multiple kubernetes clusters, manually entering to the kubectl config is time consuming and error prone Add the two config files to the env var export KUBECONFIG=~/.kube/config:~/Desktop/configFile2.yaml Review that you have two configurations in one view kubectl config view View the raw config and output to a new file kubectl config view –raw > test.yaml cp test.yaml .kube/config env you can unset the KUBECONFIG later on
